abstract: Watching TV online or on mobile devices, and discussing TV shows with friends in social media like Facebook and Twitter, are becoming bigger parts of the television experience.
snippet: Watching TV online or on mobile devices, and discussing TV shows with friends in social media like Facebook and Twitter, are becoming bigger parts of the television experience.
lead_paragraph: IF the different ways to watch television could be likened to a TV dinner, the TV set is still the Salisbury steak or fried chicken main course. (Or perhaps the turkey.) But the vegetables, mashed potatoes and desserts  that is, watching TV online or on mobile devices, and discussing TV shows with friends in social media like Facebook and Twitter  are becoming bigger parts of the meal.

headline.main: CW Adds Shows to Text About
headline.print_headline: CW Adds Shows To Text About
